name: Let's Play: Flight Attendant
overview: Please place your luggage above your head, bring your seat to the upright position and fasten your seatbelt... In Let's Play Flight Attendant, you could have the chance to serve a famous person in 1st class! Will it be a millionaire or a movie star? - Put up your hair, choose your lipstick, color and dress yourself in your favorite uniform - Serve customers fresh drinks and tasty sandwiches - Show the passengers the safety instructions - Succeed and earn stars to become the best flight attendant!
